TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CommonObjectSecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity
Public MustInherit Class CommonObjectSecurity Inherits ObjectSecurity

summary.span: Controls access to objects without direct manipulation of access control lists (ACLs).

span.span: Controls access to objects without direct manipulation of access control lists (ACLs).

summary.span: This class is the abstract base class for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void AddAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule rule) cil managed

span.span: The access rule to add.

summary.span: Adds the specified access rule to the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

span.span: Adds the specified access rule to the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入存取規則可能會導致現有的存取規則要合併的 DACL。Adding an access rule might cause existing access rules in the DACL to be merged. 若要避免不小心允許存取主體，應用程式應該檢查是否有允許每個人的完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 存取控制項目 (ACE)，並將它移除之前修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void AddAuditRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule rule) cil managed

span.span: The audit rule to add.

summary.span: Adds the specified audit rule to the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this object.

span.span: Adds the specified audit rule to the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入稽核規則可能會導致現有的存取規則要合併的 SACL。Adding an audit rule might cause existing access rules in the SACL to be merged.

span.span: if the DACL is successfully modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免不小心允許存取主體，應用程式應該檢查是否有允許每個人的完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 存取控制項目 (ACE)，並將它移除之前修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance bool RemoveAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule rule) cil managed
Protected Function RemoveAccessRule (rule As AccessRule) As Boolean

span.span: The access rule to remove.

summary.span: Removes access rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

span.span: Removes access rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

returns.span: if the access rule was successfully removed; otherwise, .

span.span: if the access rule was successfully removed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取被透過使用複雜的演算法，可能會加入存取控制規則，除了移除它們。Access removal is accomplished by using a complex algorithm that might add access control rules in addition to removing them. 這個方法無法移除此存取規則，並傳回`false`如果相關聯的存取規則的繼承規則，才能成功移除演算法太複雜。This method fails to remove the access rule and returns `false` if the inheritance rules associated with the access rule are too complex for the removal algorithm to succeed. 若要避免不小心允許存取主體，應用程式應該檢查是否有允許每個人的完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 存取控制項目 (ACE)，並將它移除之前修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void RemoveAccessRuleAll(class System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule rule) cil managed

span.span: The access rule to remove.

summary.span: Removes all access rules that have the same security identifier as the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

span.span: Removes all access rules that have the same security identifier as the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免不小心允許存取主體，應用程式應該檢查是否有允許每個人的完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 存取控制項目 (ACE)，並將它移除之前修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void RemoveAccessRuleSpecific(class System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule rule) cil managed

span.span: The access rule to remove.

summary.span: Removes all access rules that exactly match the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

span.span: Removes all access rules that exactly match the specified access rule from the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免不小心允許存取主體，應用程式應該檢查是否有允許每個人的完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 存取控制項目 (ACE)，並將它移除之前修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance bool RemoveAuditRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule rule) cil managed
Protected Function RemoveAuditRule (rule As AuditRule) As Boolean

span.span: The audit rule to remove.

summary.span: Removes audit rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this object.

span.span: Removes audit rules that contain the same security identifier and access mask as the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this object.

returns.span: if the audit rule was successfully removed; otherwise, .

span.span: if the audit rule was successfully removed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 稽核移除被透過使用複雜的演算法，可能會加入稽核控制規則，除了移除它們。Audit removal is accomplished by using a complex algorithm that might add audit control rules in addition to removing them. 這個方法會移除稽核規則失敗，並傳回`false`如果稽核規則相關聯的繼承規則，才能成功移除演算法太複雜。This method fails to remove the audit rule and returns `false` if the inheritance rules associated with the audit rule are too complex for the removal algorithm to succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void RemoveAuditRuleAll(class System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule rule) cil managed

span.span: The audit rule to remove.

summary.span: Removes all audit rules that have the same security identifier as the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this object.

span.span: Removes all audit rules that have the same security identifier as the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void RemoveAuditRuleSpecific(class System.Security.AccessControl.AuditRule rule) cil managed

span.span: The audit rule to remove.

summary.span: Removes all audit rules that exactly match the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this object.

span.span: Removes all audit rules that exactly match the specified audit rule from the System Access Control List (SACL) associated with this object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void ResetAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule rule) cil managed

span.span: The access rule to reset.

summary.span: Removes all access rules in the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object and then adds the specified access rule.

span.span: Removes all access rules in the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object and then adds the specified access rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免不小心允許存取主體，應用程式應該檢查是否有允許每個人的完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 存取控制項目 (ACE)，並將它移除之前修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.

span.span: The access rule to set.

summary.span: Removes all access rules that contain the same security identifier and qualifier as the specified access rule in the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object and then adds the specified access rule.

span.span: Removes all access rules that contain the same security identifier and qualifier as the specified access rule in the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) associated with this object and then adds the specified access rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免不小心允許存取主體，應用程式應該檢查是否有允許每個人的完整存取 (權限 AEFA) 存取控制項目 (ACE)，並將它移除之前修改 DACL。To avoid unintentionally allowing access to principals, applications should check for the existence of an allow everyone full access (AEFA) access control entry (ACE) and remove it before modifying a DACL.
